title: Gemstone
body: My gemstone that I was saving for Annie skin disappeared. Does it have a time limit ? Anyone that can check what happened?

replies.body: Are you sure that you didn't convert it into a chest?
hey how about their drop rate though, my first chest i got one, I've opened 40+ chests since then still haven't got another. feelsbadman

Gemstones don't expire, looks like something weird is going on. Make sure you get in touch with [**Riot** support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) about it, they should sort it out for you ;)

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
I think the same thing might have happened to me. I'm sure I had one and now I don't. Do they expire? And if so how are you supposed to get 10?
I have no idea, in several months I only had the 1.
